messages.content: What is the purpose of comfyui-search-navigation?
comfyui-search-navigation is a custom node in ComfyUI that allows users to easily search for nodes by title or name, making it more convenient to navigate through the user interface.
How can you open or close the search navigation in ComfyUI?
You can open or close the search navigation in ComfyUI by pressing the hotkey combination `Shift + F`.
What should you do if there are a lot of duplicate nodes in ComfyUI?
If there are a lot of duplicate nodes in ComfyUI, you should set titles manually to make it easier to search for specific nodes using the search navigation feature.
How can you center the view on a selected node in ComfyUI?
You can center the view on a selected node in ComfyUI by pressing the `Enter` key.
What is the hotkey combination to cycle through navigation history in ComfyUI?
The hotkey combination to cycle through navigation history in ComfyUI is `Shift + Left/Right`.
How can you re-focus the search bar after performing other actions in ComfyUI?
You can re-focus the search bar after performing other actions in ComfyUI by pressing the `?` key.
How can you access the settings to change hotkeys and other settings in ComfyUI?
You can access the settings to change hotkeys and other settings in ComfyUI by clicking on the gear icon (âš™) in the search navigation.
What are the steps to install comfyui-search-navigation?
To install comfyui-search-navigation, first `cd` to `ComfyUI/custom_nodes`, then run the command `git clone` followed by the repository URL.
